item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo A/C FLOW RATE Selector

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector "INOP - LEAVE OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Position the Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) LOWER LOBE CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE Selector OFF.
Select the ECS Maintenance page on the CMC and:
Confirm Cabin SOV POS indicates open (OP) for LWR FWD and LWR AFT valves.
Confirm FRV POSITION indicates closed (0.0) for LWR FWD and LWR AFT valves.
